name: Nano Cube of Death

items.alias: Pattern of the Occurence of Death

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Nophex Cube" "255542" a special Pattern of Death ( ie : #L "Pattern of Approaching Death" "255550" ) #L "Kenneth's Polishing Gel" "255555" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Pattern of Death + Nophex Cube = Nophex Cube of Death ( ie : #L "Nophex Cube of Approaching Death" "255545" ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Kenneth's Polishing Gel + Nophex Cube of Death = Nano Cube ( ie : #L "Nano Cube (Cellular Re-Structure)" "254433" ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Nano Cube (Cellular Re-Structure)" "254433": #L "Pattern of Approaching Death" "255550" #L "Nano Cube (Poisoned Thorns)" "254436": #L "Pattern of Impending Death" "255551" #L "Nano Cube (Frost Blades)" "254438": #L "Pattern of Inevitable Death" "255552" #L "Nano Cube (Magma Covering)" "254440": #L "Pattern of Imminent Death" "255553" #L "Nano Cube (Self Illumination)" "254442": #L "Pattern of the Occurence of Death" "255554" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ NT secret weapons...
